Room.Name: Jungle Grove
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a grove of giant trees, and vines hang from them all.
Room.LongDescription: High overhead you occasionally see shadowy forms watching you with glowing red eyes. Out of the corner of your eye there is movement, but when you turn your head, its gone. At the Iilandi University in the city of Ocean- crest there is a research group that says there is a nest of Ettercaps living in the jungle of Uland Island. Ettercaps are ugly bipeds that get along well with spiders. Around two meters tall, they have spindly legs and large pot-bellies. Their arms reach nearly to their ankles.
